# Use this for a simple solution.. RESPONSE=`exec osascript <<EOF | tr "\r" "\n"
--To be asked for your password each time then use: do shell script "apachectl restart" with administrator privileges
--To skip password vaildation then change this... not for the security conscious. --do shell script "apachectl restart" password "the_password" with administrator privileges
EOF`
echo $RESPONSE
